s: Item is brand new, top quality, and shipped quickly. ... Looking for a excellent quality knife this is the one..I’m a combat medic Veteran HM2 with C Company 1/4 ... I ordered one of these assuming it had the same diameter handle and width of the blade as the standard kabar.....I was wrong.

It is 100% authentic, amazon usually always sells there items at a lower price than the manufacturer. If you look on kabars website they actually recommend that you buy from other sites bc cheaper prices can be found
